title: Trailblazer League/Guide/Smithing

properties.name: description
properties.value: Smithing is heavily modified by all three tier 1 relics.

Overview[edit | edit source]

Main article: Pay-to-play Smithing training

Smithing is heavily modified by all three tier 1 relics.

  • Endless Harvest allows players to gather ore more quickly.
  • Production Master allows players to smelt an inventory of ore and smith an inventory of bars instantly.
  • Skilling Prodigy allows players to bypass low-level and low XP content.

Training[edit | edit source]

Obtaining materials[edit | edit source]

See the Mining guide for more information on obtaining ore.

Coal[edit | edit source]

Coal may be more easily obtained from activities other than Mining, see coal sources.

  • Kingdom Management can provide up to 546 coal per day.
  • The Theatre of Blood commonly rewards several hundred noted coal.
  • Larran's chests commonly rewards several hundred noted coal.
  • Ordan runs a shop within the Blast Furnace which periodically stocks up to 100 coal.

Other methods[edit | edit source]

Zalcano provides significant quantities of raw ore, coal, and metal bars used to train Smithing.

Blast Furnace[edit | edit source]

The Blast Furnace is only accessible if a player unlocks the Fremennik Provinces area. Any ore smelted requires 50% less coal. All ore is processed instantly. Ice gloves are provided upon unlocking the Fremennik Provinces area. The Blast Furnace will be operated by dwarf NPCs who charge players 72,000 coins per hour. Players with below level 60 Smithing must pay an additional 2,500 coins to the Foreman every 10 minutes for access to the Blast Furnace.

Anvil locations[edit | edit source]

The following table lists the closest anvil to a bank in each region. A full list of anvil locations may be found here.

Region Location Distance to bank Notes
Misthalin✓ Western Varrock 10 This is the most convenient anvil located in the starting area, and the second-closest anvil to a bank available.
Karamja✓ North of Shilo Village 304 The anvil is located north of Tai Bwo Wannai and the nearest bank is located in Shilo Village.
Asgarnia✓ North-east Burthorpe 71 The closest bank is in the Rogues' Den.
Fremennik✓ Blast Furnace 20 Requires 60 Smithing.
Kandarin✓ Port Khazard 12 Just West of the Fishing Trawler minigame.
Desert✓ Nardah 45 The anvil is located in Seddu's Adventurer's Store.
Morytania✓ Darkmeyer 134 Requires the Sins of the Father quest and Vyre noble clothing equipped to avoid aggressive NPCs.
Tirannwn✓ South-Eastern Prifddinas 9 This is the closest anvil to a bank, and the closest anvil to a furnace.
Wilderness✓ Western Ruins 154 The closest bank is in the Ferox Enclave.

Furnace locations[edit | edit source]

The following table lists the closest furnace to a bank in each region. A full list of furnace locations may be found here.

Players may wish to use the Blast Furnace or the standard spell superheat item at the cost of 4 1 with level 43 Magic instead.

Region Location Distance to bank Notes
Misthalin✓ Edgeville 14 While Varrock armour 4 is equipped, players have a 10% chance to smelt any two bars at once while using this furnace. This is the second closest furnace to a bank located in the starting area, and the third-closest overall.
Karamja✓ Shilo Village 11 Players must pay 20 coins per entry to the building containing this furnace unless they possess Karamja gloves 4. Players may deposit coins with Yohnus to pay this fee. This is the closest furnace to a bank located in the starting area and tied for the closest furnace to a bank.
Asgarnia✓ Falador 39 The closest bank is the Falador West bank.
Fremennik✓ Neitiznot 15 Requires partial completion of The Fremennik Isles.
Kandarin✓ Elemental workshop 52 The closest bank is in Seers' Village.
Desert✓ Al-Kharid 30 Located directly north of the Al-Kharid bank.
Morytania✓ Port Phasmatys 17 Requires a ghostspeak amulet to enter.
Tirannwn✓ Prifddinas 11 This is the closest furnace to a bank, and the closest furnace to an anvil.
Wilderness✓ Wilderness Resource Area 93 The closest bank is in the Edgeville via the wilderness lever. Player may also note items with Piles for 50 coins each.

Other equipment[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Ring of forging Misthalin✓ While equipped, players have a 100% success rate while smelting iron bars. Has 140 charges.
Goldsmithing gauntlets Desert✓ AND Fremennik✓ While equipped, the experience gained from smelting gold ore into a gold bar is increased from 22.5 to 56.2 experience.
Coal bag Asgarnia✓ Holds up to 27 pieces of coal (36 if Smithing cape is equipped). Can be purchased from Prospector Percy's Nugget Shop for 100 golden nuggets.

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Spicy stew (orange spice) Desert✓ Boosts Smithing by ±0-5. Requires manual completion of the Freeing Evil Dave subquest in Recipe for Disaster.
Dwarven stout Misthalin✓ Boosts Smithing by 1. Can be obtained in the starting area from rockslugs with level 20 Slayer and a bag of salt or rock golems in the Enchanted Valley. See other sources.
Dwarven stout(m) Morytania✓ Fremennik✓ Boosts Smithing by 2. Requires the Morytania or Fremennik region to brew with level 19 Cooking, more easily produced by using the stuff from Trouble Brewing. May otherwise be obtained from completing the Forgettable Tale... quest++.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Region Master Notes
Smithing Cape Asgarnia✓ Thurgo While equipped, it allows the coal bag to hold 36 coal instead of 27 and provides the experience-boosting effect of the goldsmith gauntlets+.
